---
title: "Diamonds price more than 200$"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(ggplot2)

price200 <- diamonds %>%
    select(price,color,carat,cut)  %>%
    filter(price >= "200") %>%
    arrange(desc(color)) %>%
  head(10)
```
